Name: WebView
Description: Displays web content from a URL or HTML source.

Properties.Name: Source
Properties.Description: The web content source (UrlWebViewSource or HtmlWebViewSource).

Events.Name: ProcessTerminated
Events.Description: Raised when the web process terminates unexpectedly.

Constructors.Description: Creates a WebView and adds children.
Creates a WebView and sets a string URL source.
Creates a WebView and sets a Uri source.
